metadata.description: 8.5 BTC Bitcoin puzzle - 6 parts combine to form private key
metadata.keywords: bitcoin, puzzle, riddle, 8.5btc, QR codes, private key
metadata.author: RidΨdle Puzzle

hypotheses.description: 6 parts combine via formula 3*9,3*8 =Σ= to create private key
reasoning: Formula 3*9,3*8 suggests: 3 parts of 9 chars + 3 parts of 8 chars = 27+24 = 51 chars
51-52 characters is exact length of WIF private key format
All 6 parts concatenate to form complete private key

hypotheses.description: Each QR code contains a hex segment that combines into full private key
reasoning: QR codes commonly encode hex strings
Private key in hex is 64 characters
Need to decode all 4 QR codes + extract parts 2,3

hypotheses.description: Formula 3*9,3*8 =Σ= indicates mathematical operation on parts
reasoning: Could mean: (part1*9 + part2*9 + part3*9) + (part4*8 + part5*8 + part6*8)
Or: concatenate in groups of 3*9 and 3*8 character lengths
Less likely: actual multiplication, more likely: length indicators

attempts.input: 3*9,3*8 =Σ= privkey, QR codes at parts 1,4,5,6, Parts 2,3 are text/numbers
notes: 3 parts × 9 chars + 3 parts × 8 chars = 51 char WIF key
Would arrange parts: decode QRs, determine lengths, concatenate
Would decode QR codes to hex strings
6 parts × ~10-11 chars = 64 char hex private key
Would apply Σ (sum) operation to parts
